params.description: Pass in `params` as json serialized object to specify url query parameters. This is an alternative to adding a query string to the `url` parameter

*Example*: If a u"

rating.description: (Required) The rating given by the user ranging from 0 to 10. Ratings above 5 will fine-tune the algorithm to find more companies similar to that one.
